ace.binary

Class BinaryComposer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ace.Ace
      • ace.binary.BinaryComposer

  • public class BinaryComposer
extends Ace
    Useful binary data fluent and flexible composing class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BinaryComposer.Mode
      Enumerates the supported binary composition modes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ace.Ace

        ACE_VERSION, DEVELOPMENT, EMPTY_OBJECT, GEH

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryComposer()
      Default constructor which sets the binary composition mode to the default (STREAM).
      BinaryComposer(BinaryComposer.Mode mode)
      Constructor taking the desired binary composition mode.
      BinaryComposer(byte[] content)
      Constructor taking a byte array as the initial data.
      BinaryComposer(char[] content)
      Constructor taking a char array as the initial data.
      BinaryComposer(java.io.File file)
      Constructor taking a file as the initial data.
      BinaryComposer(java.io.InputStream content)
      Constructor taking an input stream as the initial data.
      BinaryComposer(int length, byte filling)
      Constructor taking a generated byte array as the initial data specified by its length and the filling.
      BinaryComposer(java.lang.String content)
      Constructor taking a string as the initial data.
